title: Wicked
description: Seventeen year-old, Skyla Messenger is wishing people would just stay dead.With Chloe back, Skyla finds it difficult to live under her tyranny and threats.A seemingly innocent misstep in Skylaâ€™s past comes back to haunt her and could end up costing her relationship with Gage.About the author; Addison Moore is a graduate of the University of Southern California who enjoys writing young adult paranormal romance. She often overdoses on chocolate and watches way too much reality TV.Other books in the Celestra Series:ETHEREAL (Celestra Series Book 1)TREMBLE (Celestra Series Book 2)BURN (Celestra Series Book 3)
author: Addison Moore
